Today (2024-Jan-12) is Gamēliṓn 1, νουμηνίᾳ Γαμηλιῶνος, day 179 of 354 in the year 2023/2024.
This Gamēliṓn will have 29 days, which the ancient Greeks called a “hollow month” (κοῖλος μήν) as opposed to a “full month” (πλήρης μήν) of 30.
Festivals in Gamēliṓn:\n\n12–21: Lenaia (Λήναια)

Today (2024-Feb-10) is Anthestēriṓn 1, νουμηνίᾳ Ἀνθεστηριῶνος, day 208 of 354 in the year 2023/2024.
This Anthestēriṓn will have 30 days, which the ancient Greeks called a “full month” (πλήρης μήν) as opposed to a “hollow month” (κοῖλος μήν) of 29.

Festivals in Anthestēriṓn:

11–13: Anthesteria (Ἀνθεστήρια)
23: Diasia (Διάσια)
